body.p: ED/2013/2 did not propose any additional disclosures. The vast majority of respondents agreed with this. The IASB confirmed that additional disclosures are not required. However, the IASB noted that an entity may consider disclosures in accordance with IFRS 7 Financial Instruments: Disclosures, which requires qualitative and quantitative disclosures about credit risk.
